presets.name: 掩盖+缺陷修复
presets.prompt: Remove the green area with other pixels unmodified.

presets.name: Remove Object
presets.prompt: Remove the selected object and fill the area with the surrounding background seamlessly.

presets.name: Replace with Sky
presets.prompt: Replace the selected area with a beautiful blue sky with soft clouds.

presets.name: Add Grass
presets.prompt: Fill the selected area with natural green grass texture.

presets.name: Add Water
presets.prompt: Replace the selected area with realistic water surface with gentle ripples.

presets.name: Blur Background
presets.prompt: Apply a soft blur effect to the selected background area while keeping edges natural.

presets.name: Add Person
presets.prompt: Add a realistic person standing naturally in the selected area.

presets.name: Add Tree
presets.prompt: Add a natural-looking tree in the selected area that matches the scene.

presets.name: Fix Lighting
presets.prompt: Adjust the lighting in the selected area to match the surrounding environment.
